transformers.description: This Transformer Will Update the OperationId of the provided OAS in the Standard Flow GetOAS to be equals the unique identifier of the corresponding proxy flow (ProxyName.ProxyEndPointName.FlowName.Verb )
transformers.guidelines: Create New Class and extend it with com.smartvalue.apigee.migration.transformers.proxy.ProxyTransformer then implement the transform method
